docs.text: Hiroki build REST APIs faster than ever using the open source tools and standards you and your team already know. hiroki is an open source tool inspired by baucis . hiroki is fully compatible with mongoose 4 and 5. hiroki is written in ES6 standards. Getting Started To install: npm install --save hiroki Create simple rest api: ... const app = express(); const UsersSchema = new mongoose.Schema({name}); mongoose.model('Users', UsersSchema); hiroki.rest('Users');//enable GET,PUT,POST DELETE methods app.use('/api', hiroki.build()); app.listen(8012); Sponsors:
